file.name: bcol-api-1.0.0.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: bcol-api-1.0.0.yaml
  version: '1.0'
  description: BCOL API
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:3000'
paths:
  /profiles:
    post:
      summary: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: ../../../bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/profile_response.json
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    userId: PB25020
                    accountNumber: '180670'
                    authCode: M
                    authCodeDesc: Master
                    accountType: B
                    accountTypeDesc: Billable
                    gstStatus: ''
                    gstStatusDesc: Must-Pay
                    pstStatus: ''
                    pstStatusDesc: Must-Pay
                    userName: 'BRIDGER, JULIE'
                    orgName: BC ONLINE TECHNICAL TEAM DEVL
                    orgType: LAW
                    phone: (250)953-8271 EX1999
                    fax: (250)953-8212
                    address:
                      line1: '#400A - 4000 SEYMOUR PLACE'
                      line2: PENTHOUSE
                      city: AB1
                      province: BC
                      country: CANADA
                      postalCode: V8X 5J8
                    profileFlags:
                      - OSBR
                      - ADS
                      - COLIN_TYPE
                      - COMP
                      - ICBC
                      - MH
                      - LTO
                      - SES
                      - PPR
                      - VS
                      - CCREF
                      - CCREL
                      - ATSOURCE
                      - COURT_SERVICES
                      - EMERGIS
                      - LOCATION_CODE
      description: Verify User Profile
      operationId: verify_profile
      requestBody:
        description: ''
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: ../../../bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/accounts_request.json
            examples:
              example-1:
                value: '{ "userId": "test", "password": "password" }'
  /payments:
    post:
      summary: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: ../../../bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/payment_response.json
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    statutoryFee: '-700'
                    totalAmount: '-850'
                    tsFee: '-150'
                    gst: '+00'
                    pst: '+00'
                    accountNumber: '180670'
                    userId: PB25020
                    date: '20191125:125330505'
                    feeCode: BSH105
                    key: TEST
                    sequenceNo: '0001'
      description: Post payment to BC Online
components:
  schemas: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/payments": post: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: $ref: resolve "../../../bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/payment_response.json": property "address": at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcgov/sbc-pay/99fe21589030e4bec6d2bd2a39ac6b7f56f2cc28/bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/payment_response.json:51:17: $ref: resolve "./adress.json": get "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcgov/sbc-pay/99fe21589030e4bec6d2bd2a39ac6b7f56f2cc28/bcol-api/src/bcol_api/schemas/schemas/adress.json": https: bad HTTP code 404 (Not Found)
